alert.note: Alert for Anson; Harnett; Hoke; Nash; Richmond; Scotland; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 18 at 3:30AM EDT until March 20 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Nash, Wake, Harnett, Anson, Richmond, Scotland and Hoke Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 10 AM EDT Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Anson; Harnett; Hoke; Nash; Richmond; Scotland; Wake
